title: Rejuvenating Spa, Washer and Dryer in each Apartment Home, Microwave
posting_body: ['Water Tower Flats is a place so unique it hardly seems right to call it just an apartment community.', 'Here you will find spacious one and two bedroom homes, our very own movie theater and entertaining kitchen, year-round heated pool and even a tanning booth just for our valued residents.', 'Also enjoy being only steps away from Olde Town Arvada and the RTD Light Rail Station, now open!', '-Cherry Cabinets with Nickel Hardware', '-Ceiling Fans', '-Public Transportation', '-Microwave', '-Two-Toned Paint Schemes', '-Built-in Desks / Book Shelves', '-Central Heating and Air-Conditioning', '-Tanning Bed', '-Yoga/spin Studio', '-Granite Countertops', '-patio/balconies', '-Business Center', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Our pricing changes daily.', 'Please call or email us today for updated pricing and availability.', '*Our pricing changes daily.', 'Please call or email us today for updated pricing and availability.']
